creator: kamachan@cisco.com
text:
When used the above ( setStatus() and setHeader() ) instead of the sendRedirect
() , i found issue in opening the SSL Session. Please let me know if there is 
any issue related to the implementation of the above . 
Also , let me know if the exact implementation of the SendRedirect() <==> 
setHeader and SetStatus() ).

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
1) The version is an old unsupported version
2) The description doesn't make sense
3) You have access to the source to answer your question (if you need to know
how something is implemented)
4) Bugzilla is not a help desk forum

Please use the tomcat-user list to determine if something is a bug or not.
